article.name: How do I prevent alerts from being issued at specific times such as maintenance?
article.title: How do I prevent alerts from being issued at specific times such as maintenance?
article.body:
To suppress alerts during certain periods of time when expecting a load increase or a stoppage of service such as batch processing at night, backup processing, and scheduled maintenance periods, you can temporarily suspend monitoring altogether by setting a downtime. This will prevent alerts from being issued.

Configuring Downtime
